description: The history of Medicare Advantage errors that have been removed from a coverage. Each row represents an error that has been resolved. CVG_MA_ERRORS has the errors currently present on coverages.

columns.name: COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MA_ERR_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Medicare Advantage error code that was previously on the coverage


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Part A Not Effective


Part B Not Effective


Part D Not Effective


Member Not Found


Deceased


Date of Birth Mismatch


Sex Mismatch


First Name Mismatch


Last Name Mismatch


Middle Name Mismatch


Incorrect Part C Premium


Incorrect Part D Premium


Incorrect Contract


Incorrect PBP


Incorrect Segment


Enrolled According to CMS


Not Enrolled According to CMS


Termed Prior to Enrollment


Not Pending Prior to Enrollment


Medicaid Status Flag Mismatch


ESRD Status Flag Mismatch


Part A Entitlement Date Mismatch


Part B Entitlement Date Mismatch


Hospice Status Flag Mismatch


Long Term Institutional Status Flag Mismatch


Eligibility Reason Mismatch


Part D Eligibility Date Mismatch


Application Date Outside Election Period


Missing Rx Information

columns.name: MA_ERR_DATA
columns.description: The data from the CMS file associated with the Medicare Advantage error

columns.name: MA_ERR_DATE
columns.description: The date that the error was reported.

columns.name: MA_ERR_CODE_FILE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of CMS file that caused this error to be logged.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Batch Eligibility Query Response


Monthly NoRx File


Monthly Membership Report


Full Enrollment File Data

columns.name: MA_ERR_RESOLUTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the error was resolved.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Resolved


Ignored


Replaced


BEQ Resubmitted

columns.name: MA_ERR_RESOLUTION_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who resolved the error.

columns.name: MA_ERR_RESOLUTION_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the error was resolved.
